name: Diver: The Wind Rises
description:
A 3D video game made in Unity with assets from Youth Digital. I taught children how to develop their own games using the same assets and instructions I was given to make this game while working for Youth Digital at a summer camp. Of course this is definitely a work in progress, and I'd love to add more scenes or an epilogue, more interactions with Coins, and continue honing my skills in Unity (C# programming, asset management, publishing, writing) with this game.

This is my first real foray into video game design and development, and I hope to make many more games!
